# Select a text

```{r}
df <- manuscript_meta %>% 
  select(-googlesheet_with_text, 
         -googlesheet_id, 
         -Notes,
         -id) %>% 
  #filter(!(Catalogue_id %in% c("test_text_1", "test_text_2"))) %>% 
  arrange(desc(has_content), desc(Date_added)) %>% 
  mutate(Date_added = as.character(Date_added)) %>% 
  mutate(Identifier_popular = ifelse(has_content == "yes",
                                     str_c("<a href='/manuscripts/", Catalogue_id, "/'>", Identifier_popular, "</a>"),
                                     Identifier_popular)) %>% 
  select(-has_content, -Date_added, -Catalogue_id, -website_photo_extension)

#across(-has_content, ~str_c("som))

df %>% 
  datatable(rownames = FALSE,
            filter = 'top',
            escape = FALSE,
            class = 'row-border',
            extensions = 'FixedColumns', 
            elementId = "manuscriptListDT",
            options = list(pageLength = 20, scrollX = TRUE, scrollCollapse = TRUE, fixedColumns = list(leftColumns = 2)))
```
